title: Krolestwo
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, European, Polish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. "Kingdom" is located in the city centre's main roundabout, next to the Spodek building and the Silesian Upspring Monument - get there by underground tunnels or by trams (e.g. line 6 or 16). Offers several, important silesian cultural events, concerts, parties and is host to the VeganMania fair. Menu has 2 or 3 different kinds of vegan salads plus sandwiches with tofu or falafel (omit tzatziki), hummus with avocado, and other vegan snacks.
